FandomActivity

Class FandomActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • FandomActivity.FandomActivity

  • public class FandomActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Can be used to receive information about Fandom activities like recent changes or forum posts.
    Author:
    Mika Thein
    See Also:
    FandomActivity(Fandom), Fandom

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Fandom fandom
      The Fandom.
      static java.io.File storageFile
      The storage file is used to store IDs of recent activities to prevent triggering listeners for multiple times due to the same event.

      Constructors

      FandomActivity(Fandom fandom)
      Creates a new FandomActivity instance.

      • getRecentChanges

        public FandomRecentChange[] getRecentChanges(FandomUser author,
                                             FandomPage page,
                                             java.lang.String latestTimestamp,
                                             int limit)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Besides limit, each parameter can be set to null to be ignored.
        Parameters:
        author - the Fandom user
        page - the Fandom page
        latestTimestamp - the latest timestamp (inclusive, stops generating any earlier changes)
        limit - the max amount of recent changes (0 to 100)
        Returns:
        limit recent changes by author on page since timestamp
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the API is unreachable

                                   int limitForum,

                                   java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        author - the author
        limitForum - the max amount of forum posts (0 to 100)
        limitWall - the max amount of wall posts (0 to 100)
        limitArticleComments - the max amount of article comments (0 to 100)

        Throws:

      • addListener

        public void addListener(FandomActivityListener l)
        Adds a listener to the watchlist. All listeners will be notified whenever a new activity was registered.
        If Fandom.RESET_STORAGE is false, these listeners will be notified for events they may already have been notified for before.
        Parameters:
        l - the listener
